properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING 10.5 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. 15 AND 16 FEB ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING
      31-01.58S 046-58.68W, 31-26.57S 047-22.75W,
      30-44.62S 047-22.43W, 30-25.53S 048-46.95W.
   B. 17 AND 18 FEB ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      31-26.57S 047-22.75W AND 30-25.53S 048-46.95W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 19 FEB 13.
